Author: catsinsunglassess
Text: It sounds like she may also be sick, and if you have stomach problems it can cause you to not really want to eat. You could also talk to her about it.

Author: bir_die
Text: How close of a relationship do you two have?   You can bring it up to your family- maybe not directly say “eating disorder”; but express your deep concern about her not seeming healthy at all and that to you, it seems linked to malnutrition.   If you two are very close, if you’re gentle enough, you can ask her how she’s doing, you’ve noticed she’s not as healthy as she was a little while ago, ask if there’s anything you can do to help.   Outside of that, everything is in her own and her direct family’s hands.
